name: Presidents - Rule the USA
description:
Are you watching the presidential campaigns and thinking that you could do better? Well, why not become the President and see if you can be the leader of the free world?

Be aware every decision you make will have an effect. With great power comes great responsibility to your fellow citizens.

Do you still think you can hack being the President? Become the president and endure the politics, wars, lies, real-life scenarios that every president faces and make name for yourself.

Will you be able to find a balance between a luxurious lifestyle, your family, and a president’s duty to their country? Will you sellout for money, or fight to the last breath to preserve the welfare and the prosperity of the United States of America?


With each scenario, you will feel the pressure of being a president, yet also feel the exhilaration and pride of the office.The unpredictable nature of the world will captivate you.The game affords the player the opportunity to reflect on their political beliefs and values as they engage in the political discourse. Strategy and long-term plans will face domestic and foreign threats. Each decision will require you to weigh many factors. Your country depends on you. Do your part to help America succeed.

Presidents | Rule the USA allows you to:

– Swipe to determine the fate of United States of America,
– Make 250+ choices that will change the balance of the world,
– Live the change and feel the pressure of being the President,
– Make your own decisions as the President of the USA!

Live your dream of being the president of the most powerful country in the world!

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact Presidents App (us) at support@presidentsapp.com, or visit Presidents App Website at https://presidentsapp.com/
